info.report-description: LTE EPS Bearer measurement (M8006) measures EPS Bearer related measurements.

kpi_info.title: period_duration (period_duration)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_SETUP_ATTEMPTS (M8006C0)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup attempts. Each bearer of the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Request or an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_SETUP_COMPLETIONS (M8006C1)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup completions. Each bearer of the "E-RAB Setup List" IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response or an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_SETUP_FAIL_RNL (M8006C2)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup failures due to any Radio Network Layer cause except "radio resources not available". Each bearer of the "E-RAB Failed to Setup List" IE is counted.UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response or an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE,or an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Failure message sent by the eNB to the MME with any RNL cause except "radio resources not available".

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_SETUP_FAIL_TRPORT (M8006C3)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup failures due to Transport Layer. Each bearer of the "E-RAB Failed to Setup List" IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response or an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE,or an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Failure message sent by the eNB to the MME.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_SETUP_FAIL_RESOUR (M8006C4)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup failures due to Resource reasons. Each bearer of the "E-RAB Failed to Setup List" IE has to be counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response or an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE,or an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Failure message sent by the eNB to the MME with RNL cause "radio resources not available".

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_SETUP_FAIL_OTH (M8006C5)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup failures due to Other reasons. Each bearer of the "E-RAB Failed to Setup List" IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response or an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE, or an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Failure message sent by the eNB to the MME. The counter is updated if the failure detected does not match any other failure counter.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_NORM (M8006C6)
kpi_info.use: The number of released Data Radio Bearers due to "normal release per call". Each bearer of the "E-RAB To Be Released List" IE has to be counted. In case of a UE context release command, all established EPS Bearers are counted. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE COMMAND or an S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is not incremented in case that the S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND is received as a response to a previously sent S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_DETACH (M8006C7)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests due to the Detach procedure by the UE or MME (NAS cause). Each bearer of the "E-RAB To Be Released List" IE has to be counted. In case of a UE context release command, all established EPS Bearers are counted. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE COMMAND or an S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is not incremented in case that the S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND is received as a response to a previously sent S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_RNL (M8006C8)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests due to the Radio Network Layer cause. Each bearer of the "E-RAB to be Released List" IE is counted. In case of a UE context release command, all established EPS Bearers are counted. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE COMMAND or an S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is not incremented in case that the S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND is received as a response to a previously sent S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_OTH (M8006C9)
kpi_info.use: The number of released Data-Radio Bearers due to Other Reasons. Each bearer of the "E-RAB To Be Released List" IE has to be counted. In case of a UE context release command, all established EPS Bearer are counted. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE COMMAND or an S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is not incremented in case that the S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE COMMAND is received as a response to a previously sent S1AP:UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST. The counter is updated if the release cause does not match any other failure counter.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_NORM (M8006C10)
kpi_info.use: The number of released E-RABs initiated by the eNB due to user inactivity. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) is transmitted with release cause "User inactivity". This counter is also updated with the number of released E-RABs.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_RNL (M8006C12)
kpi_info.use: The number of released E-RABs initiated by the eNB due to Radio Link Failure. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) is transmitted with release cause "Radio Connection With UE Lost". This counter is also updated with the number of released E-RABs.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_OTH (M8006C13)
kpi_info.use: The number of released E-RABs initiated by the eNB due to other reasons. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE INDICATION message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) or S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) is transmitted in case that the used release cause does not match with any of the following: - Release due to E-UTRAN Generated Reason - Inter-RAT redirection - Redirection towards 1xRTT - CS Fallback Triggered - Transport Resource Unavailable - Radio Connection With UE Lost - User inactivity - Radio resources not available This counter is also updated with the number of released E-RABs.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEARER_REL_REQ_TNL (M8006C14)
kpi_info.use: The number of released E-RABs initiated by the eNB due to Transport Layer reasons. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE INDICATION message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) or S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) is transmitted with release cause "Transport Resource Unavailable". This counter is also updated with the number of released E-RABs.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPSBEAR_REL_REQ_RNL_REDIR (M8006C15)
kpi_info.use: The number of released E-RABs initiated by the eNB due to Redirect. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) is transmitted in case that one of the following release causes is used: - Release due to E-UTRAN Generated Reason - Inter-RAT redirection - Redirection towards 1xRTT - CS Fallback Triggered This counter is also updated with the number of released E-RABs.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_SETUP_FAIL_HO (M8006C16)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPS bearer setup failures due to Handover Pending reason. Each bearer of the E-RAB Failed to Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB Bearer Setup Response message sent by the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_INI_QCI_1 (M8006C17)
kpi_info.use: The number of initial EPS bearer setup attempts per QCI1. Each bearer of the E-RAB to Be Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Request sent by MME to the eNB for each QCI1 bearer contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEAR_STP_ATT_INI_NON_GBR (M8006C18)
kpi_info.use: The number of initial EPS bearer setup attempts per non-GBR. Each bearer of the E-RAB to Be Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Request message sent by the MME to the eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_ADD_QCI_1 (M8006C26)
kpi_info.use: The number of additional EPS bearer setup attempts per QCI1. Each bearer of the E-RAB to Be Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:E-RAB Setup Request message sent by the MME to eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_INI_QCI1 (M8006C35)
kpi_info.use: The number of initial EPS bearer setup completions per QCI1. Each bearer of the E-RAB Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response message sent by the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEAR_STP_COM_INI_NON_GBR (M8006C36)
kpi_info.use: The number of initial EPS bearer setup completions per non-GBR. Each bearer of the E-RAB Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:Initial Context Setup Response message sent by the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEAR_SET_COM_ADDIT_QCI1 (M8006C44)
kpi_info.use: The number of additional EPS bearer setup completions for QCI1. Each bearer of the E-RAB Setup List IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB Setup Response message sent by the eNB to MME.

kpi_info.title: SUM_SIMUL_ERAB_QCI_1 (M8006C45)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the sum of sampled values for measuring the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 1 characteristics. This counter, divided by the denominator DENOM_SUM_SIMUL_ERAB, provides the average number of simultaneous QCI 1 E-RABs per cell. UPDATED: This measurement is obtained by sampling the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 1 characteristics at a pre-defined interval (1 sec) and then adding up these sample values over the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: SUM_SIMUL_ERAB_QCI_2 (M8006C46)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the sum of sampled values for measuring the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 2 characteristics. This counter, divided by the denominator DENOM_SUM_SIMUL_ERAB, provides the average number of simultaneous QCI 2 E-RABs per cell. UPDATED: This measurement is obtained by sampling the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 2 characteristics at a pre-defined interval (1 sec) and then adding up these sample values over the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: SUM_SIMUL_ERAB_QCI_3 (M8006C47)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the sum of sampled values for measuring the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 3 characteristics. This counter, divided by the denominator DENOM_SUM_SIMUL_ERAB, provides the average number of simultaneous QCI 3 E-RABs per cell. UPDATED: This measurement is obtained by sampling the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 3 characteristics at a pre-defined interval (1 sec) and then adding up these sample values over the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: SUM_SIMUL_ERAB_QCI_4 (M8006C48)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the sum of sampled values for measuring the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 4 characteristics. This counter, divided by the denominator DENOM_SUM_SIMUL_ERAB, provides the average number of simultaneous QCI 4 E-RABs per cell. UPDATED: This measurement is obtained by sampling the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 4 characteristics at a pre-defined interval (1 sec) and then adding up these sample values over the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: SUM_SIMUL_ERAB_QCI_5 (M8006C49)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the sum of sampled values for measuring the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 5 characteristics. This counter, divided by the denominator DENOM_SUM_SIMUL_ERAB, provides the average number of simultaneous QCI 5 E-RABs per cell. UPDATED: This measurement is obtained by sampling the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 5 characteristics at a pre-defined interval (1 sec) and then adding up these sample values over the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: SUM_SIMUL_ERAB_QCI_6 (M8006C50)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the sum of sampled values for measuring the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 6 characteristics. This counter, divided by the denominator DENOM_SUM_SIMUL_ERAB, provides the average number of simultaneous QCI 6 E-RABs per cell. UPDATED: This measurement is obtained by sampling the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 6 characteristics at a pre-defined interval (1 sec) and then adding up these sample values over the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: SUM_SIMUL_ERAB_QCI_7 (M8006C51)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the sum of sampled values for measuring the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 7 characteristics. This counter, divided by the denominator DENOM_SUM_SIMUL_ERAB, provides the average number of simultaneous QCI 7 E-RABs per cell. UPDATED: This measurement is obtained by sampling the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 7 characteristics at a pre-defined interval (1 sec) and then adding up these sample values over the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: SUM_SIMUL_ERAB_QCI_8 (M8006C52)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the sum of sampled values for measuring the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 8 characteristics. This counter, divided by the denominator DENOM_SUM_SIMUL_ERAB, provides the average number of simultaneous QCI 8 E-RABs per cell. UPDATED: This measurement is obtained by sampling the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 8 characteristics at a pre-defined interval (1 sec) and then adding up these sample values over the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: SUM_SIMUL_ERAB_QCI_9 (M8006C53)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the sum of sampled values for measuring the number of simultaneously E-RABs with QCI 9 characteristics. This counter, divided by the denominator DENOM_SUM_SIMUL_ERAB, provides the average number of simultaneous QCI 9 E-RABs per cell. UPDATED: This measurement is obtained by sampling the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI 9 characteristics at a pre-defined interval (1 sec) and then adding up these sample values over the measurement period.

kpi_info.title: DENOM_SUM_SIMUL_ERAB (M8006C54)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of samples, which were taken to determine the number of simultaneous E-RABs per QCI. UPDATED: This counter is incremented when the check for the respective sampling counters for the number of simultaneous E-RABs (SUM_SIMUL_ERAB_QCI_x) is done.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_ATT_QCI1 (M8006C55)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of attempted modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI1. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI1 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to be Modified List" IE (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_ATT_QCI2 (M8006C56)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of attempted modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI2. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI2 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to be Modified List" IE (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_ATT_QCI3 (M8006C57)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of attempted modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI3. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI3 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to be Modified List" IE (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_ATT_QCI4 (M8006C58)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of attempted modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI4. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI4 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to be Modified List" IE (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_ATT_QCI5 (M8006C59)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of attempted modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI5. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI5 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to be Modified List" IE (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_ATT_QCI6 (M8006C60)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of attempted modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI6. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI6 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to be Modified List" IE (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_ATT_QCI7 (M8006C61)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of attempted modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI7. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI7 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to be Modified List" IE (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_ATT_QCI8 (M8006C62)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of attempted modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI8. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI8 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to be Modified List" IE (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_ATT_QCI9 (M8006C63)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of attempted modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI9. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI9 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to be Modified List" IE (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_SUCC_QCI1 (M8006C64)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successful modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI1. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI1 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Modify List".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_SUCC_QCI2 (M8006C65)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successful modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI2. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI2 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Modify List".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_SUCC_QCI3 (M8006C66)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successful modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI3. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI3 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Modify List".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_SUCC_QCI4 (M8006C67)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successful modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI4. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI4 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Modify List".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_SUCC_QCI5 (M8006C68)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successful modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI5. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI5 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Modify List".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_SUCC_QCI6 (M8006C69)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successful modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI6. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI6 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Modify List".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_SUCC_QCI7 (M8006C70)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successful modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI7. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI7 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Modify List".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_SUCC_QCI8 (M8006C71)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successful modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI8. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI8 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Modify List".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_SUCC_QCI9 (M8006C72)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successful modifications of QoS parameters for E-RABs of QCI9. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is incremented by the number of QCI9 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Modify List".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_FAIL_TIMER (M8006C73)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of failed E-RAB modifications in case of a timeout of the RRCConnectionReconfguration procedure since the UE has not acknowledged the DRB modification. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is incremented by the number of bearers contained in the "E-RAB Failed To Modify List" with the RNL cause "Failure in the Radio Interface Procedure" (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_FAIL_QCI_NSUPP (M8006C74)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of failed E-RAB modifications, for example in case that the requested new QCI is not supported. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is incremented by the number of bearers contained in the "E-RAB Failed To Modify List" with the RNL cause "Not supported QCI Value" (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_MOD_FAIL_RNL_UNSPEC (M8006C75)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of failed E-RAB modifications in case that a QoS modification is not supported, like for example the modification of a GBR DRB or the modifcation of a DRB being used for IMS signaling or the modification of a DRB with emergency ARP. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB MODIFY RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is incremented by the number of bearers contained in the "E-RAB Failed To Modify List" with the RNL cause "Unspecified" (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_N_QCI1 (M8006C89)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests for QCI1 due to normal release by UE. Each bearer of the E-RAB to be Released List IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP: E-RAB Release Command or an S1AP: UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_D_QCI1 (M8006C98)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests for QCI1 due to the Detach procedure by the UE or the MME. Each bearer of the E-RAB to be Released List IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP: E-RAB Release Command or an S1AP: UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_R_QCI1 (M8006C107)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests for QCI1 due to the Radio Network Layer cause. Each bearer of the E-RAB to be Released List IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP: E-RAB Release Command or an S1AP: UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to eNB.

kpi_info.title: EPC_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_O_QCI1 (M8006C116)
kpi_info.use: The number of EPC-initiated EPS Bearer Release requests for QCI1 due to Other causes. Each bearer of the E-RAB to be Released List IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP: E-RAB Release Command or an S1AP: UE Context Release Command message sent by the MME to eNB.The counter is updated if the release request detected does not match any other failure counter

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_N_QCI1 (M8006C125)
kpi_info.use: The number of released QCI1 E-RABs initiated by the eNB due to user inactivity. UPDATED: This counter updated when the S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) is transmitted with release cause "User inactivity". This counter is also updated with the number of released QCI1 E-RABs.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_R_QCI1 (M8006C134)
kpi_info.use: The number of released QCI1 E-RABs initiated by the eNB due to Radio Link Failure. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) is transmitted with release cause "Radio Connection With UE Lost". This counter is also updated with the number of released QCI1 E-RABs.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_O_QCI1 (M8006C143)
kpi_info.use: The number of released QCI1 E-RABs initiated by the eNB due to other reasons. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE INDICATION message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) or S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) is transmitted in case that the used release cause does not match with any of the following: - Release due to E-UTRAN Generated Reason - Inter-RAT redirection - Redirection towards 1xRTT - CS Fallback Triggered - Transport Resource Unavailable - Radio Connection With UE Lost - User inactivity - Radio resources not available This counter is also updated with the number of released QCI1 E-RABs.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_T_QCI1 (M8006C152)
kpi_info.use: The number of released QCI1 E-RABs initiated by the eNB due to Transport Layer reasons. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the S1AP:E-RAB RELEASE INDICATION message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) or S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) is transmitted with release cause "Transport Resource Unavailable". This counter is also updated with the number of released QCI1 E-RABs.

kpi_info.title: ENB_EPS_BEAR_REL_REQ_RD_QCI1 (M8006C161)
kpi_info.use: The number of released QCI1 E-RABs initiated by the eNB due to Redirect. UPDATED: This counter is updated when the S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) is transmitted in case that one of the following release causes is used: - Release due to E-UTRAN Generated Reason - Inter-RAT redirection - Redirection towards 1xRTT - CS Fallback Triggered This counter is also updated with the number of released QCI1 E-RABs.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_INI_QCI_2 (M8006C162)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI2 characteristics. UPDATED: reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI2 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_INI_QCI_3 (M8006C163)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI3 characteristics.. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI3 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_INI_QCI_4 (M8006C164)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI4 characteristics UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI4 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_ADD_QCI_2 (M8006C165)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of additional EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI2 characteristics. UPDATED: reception of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI2 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_ADD_QCI_3 (M8006C166)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of additional EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI3 characteristics. UPDATED: reception of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI3 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_ATT_ADD_QCI_4 (M8006C167)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of additional EPS bearer setup attempts for GBR DRBs of QCI4 characteristics. UPDATED: reception of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI4 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_INI_QCI_2 (M8006C168)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI2 characteristics. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI2 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_INI_QCI_3 (M8006C169)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI3 characteristics. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI3 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_INI_QCI_4 (M8006C170)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of initial EPS bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI4 characteristics. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI4 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_ADD_QCI_2 (M8006C171)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of additional EPS bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI2 characteristics. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME.The counter is updated with the number of QCI2 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_ADD_QCI_3 (M8006C172)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of additional EPS bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI3 characteristics. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI3 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: EPS_BEARER_STP_COM_ADD_QCI_4 (M8006C173)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of additional EPS bearer setup completions for GBR DRBs of QCI4 characteristics. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI4 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: PRE_EMPT_GBR_BEARER (M8006C174)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of GBR E-RABs (Guaranteed Bit Rate bearers, 3GPP TS 23.203) being released due to lack of radio resources. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP: E-RAB RELEASE INDICATION message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) or transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) in case that these messages are used to release one or more GBR bearers with RNL cause "Radio resources not available". The counter is updated with the number of released GBR bearers.

kpi_info.title: PRE_EMPT_NON_GBR_BEARER (M8006C175)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of non-GBR E-RABs (non-Guaranteed Bit Rate bearers, 3GPP TS 23.203) being released due to lack of radio resources. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP: E-RAB RELEASE INDICATION message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) or transmission of an S1AP: UE CONTEXT RELEASE REQUEST message (eNB -> MME; 3GPP TS 36.413) in case that these messages are used to release one or more non-GBR bearers with RNL cause "Radio resources not available". The counter is updated with the number of released non-GBR bearers.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_REL_ENB_ACT_QCI1 (M8006C176)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of released active E-RABs (that is when there was user data in the queue at the time of release) with QCI1 characteristics. The release is initiated by the eNB due to radio connectivity problems. UPDATED: The counters must be updated in case that user data are buffered (UL/DL) for an E-RAB with QCI1 characteristics and the "S1AP UE Context Release Request" message is sent by eNB to the MME with the release cause "RNL Radio Connection with UE lost".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_REL_ENB_ACT_QCI2 (M8006C177)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of released active E-RABs (that is when there was user data in the queue at the time of release) with QCI2 characteristics. The release is initiated by the eNB due to radio connectivity problems. UPDATED: The counters must be updated in case that user data are buffered (UL/DL) for an E-RAB with QCI2 characteristics and the "S1AP UE Context Release Request" message is sent by eNB to the MME with the release cause "RNL Radio Connection with UE lost".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_REL_ENB_ACT_QCI3 (M8006C178)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of released active E-RABs (that is when there was user data in the queue at the time of release) with QCI3 characteristics. The release is initiated by the eNB due to radio connectivity problems. UPDATED: The counters must be updated in case that user data are buffered (UL/DL) for an E-RAB with QCI3 characteristics and the "S1AP UE Context Release Request" message is sent by eNB to the MME with the release cause "RNL Radio Connection with UE lost".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_REL_ENB_ACT_QCI4 (M8006C179)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of released active E-RABs (that is when there was user data in the queue at the time of release) with QCI4 characteristics. The release is initiated by the eNB due to radio connectivity problems. UPDATED: The counters must be updated in case that user data are buffered (UL/DL) for an E-RAB with QCI4 characteristics and the "S1AP UE Context Release Request" message is sent by eNB to the MME with the release cause "RNL Radio Connection with UE lost".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_REL_ENB_ACT_NON_GBR (M8006C180)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of released active E-RABs (that is when there was user data in the queue at the time of release) with non-GBR characteristics (QCI5...9). The release is initiated by the eNB due to radio connectivity problems. UPDATED: The counters must be updated in case that user data are buffered (UL/DL) for an E-RAB with non-GBR characteristics (QCI5...9) and the "S1AP UE Context Release Request" message is sent by eNB to the MME with the release cause "RNL Radio Connection with UE lost".

kpi_info.title: ERAB_IN_SESSION_TIME_QCI1 (M8006C181)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the aggregated in-session activity time in seconds for all E-RABs with QCI1 characteristics. The E-RAB is said to be "in session" if any user data has been transferred in UL or DL direction within the last 100msec. UPDATED: When user data are transferred the in-session activity time is aggregated during the E-RAB lifetime. At the end of the measurement period and when E-RAB is released the sum counter for all E-RABs with QCI1 characteristics shall be updated.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_IN_SESSION_TIME_QCI2 (M8006C182)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the aggregated in-session activity time in seconds for all E-RABs with QCI2 characteristics. The E-RAB is said to be "in session" if any user data has been transferred in UL or DL direction within the last 100msec. UPDATED: When user data are transferred the in-session activity time is aggregated during the E-RAB lifetime. At the end of the measurement period and when E-RAB is released the sum counter for all E-RABs with QCI2 characteristics shall be updated.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_IN_SESSION_TIME_QCI3 (M8006C183)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the aggregated in-session activity time in seconds for all E-RABs with QCI3 characteristics. The E-RAB is said to be "in session" if any user data has been transferred in UL or DL direction within the last 100msec. UPDATED: When user data are transferred the in-session activity time is aggregated during the E-RAB lifetime. At the end of the measurement period and when E-RAB is released the sum counter for all E-RABs with QCI3 characteristics shall be updated.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_IN_SESSION_TIME_QCI4 (M8006C184)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the aggregated in-session activity time in seconds for all E-RABs with QCI4 characteristics. The E-RAB is said to be "in session" if any user data has been transferred in UL or DL direction within the last 100msec. UPDATED: When user data are transferred the in-session activity time is aggregated during the E-RAB lifetime. At the end of the measurement period and when E-RAB is released the sum counter for all E-RABs with QCI4 characteristics shall be updated.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_IN_SESSION_TIME_NON_GBR (M8006C185)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the aggregated in-session activity time in seconds for all E-RABs with non-GBR (QCI5..9) characteristics. The E-RAB is said to be "in session" if any user data has been transferred in UL or DL direction within the last 100msec. UPDATED: When user data are transferred the in-session activity time is aggregated during the E-RAB lifetime. At the end of the measurement period and when E-RAB is released the sum counter for all E-RABs with non-GBR characteristics (QCI5..9) shall be updated.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_SETUP_ATT_HIPRIO (M8006C186)
kpi_info.use: The number of E-RAB Setup attempts (requests) for high priority calls.Each bearer of the "E-RAB to be Setup List" IE is counted. UPDATED: The reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP message or of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP REQUEST message in case that these messages contain an ARP (Allocation and Retention Priority) priority level value that is used to indicate a high priority call (3GPP TS 36.413).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_SETUP_SUCC_HIPRIO (M8006C187)
kpi_info.use: The number of E-RAB Setup completions for high priority calls.Each bearer of the "E-RAB Setup List" IE is counted. UPDATED: The transmission of the S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE or S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT RESPONSE message in case their "E-RAB Setup List" IEs contain E-RAB IDs of bearers for high priority calls.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_INI_SETUP_ATT_QCI1 (M8006C188)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of setup attempts for initial E-RABs of QCI1. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI1 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_INI_SETUP_ATT_QCI2 (M8006C189)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of setup attempts for initial E-RABs of QCI2. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI2 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of setup attempts for initial E-RABs of QCI3. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI3 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of setup attempts for initial E-RABs of QCI4. UPDATED: Reception of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP REQUEST message sent by MME to the eNB. The counter is updated with the number of QCI4 bearers contained in the "E-RAB to Be Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successfully established intial E-RABs of QCI1. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:INITIAL CONTEXT SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI1 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_ADD_SETUP_SUCC_QCI6 (M8006C220)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successfully established additional E-RABs of QCI6. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI6 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_ADD_SETUP_SUCC_QCI7 (M8006C221)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successfully established additional E-RABs of QCI7. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI7 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_ADD_SETUP_SUCC_QCI8 (M8006C222)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successfully established additional E-RABs of QCI8. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI8 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_ADD_SETUP_SUCC_QCI9 (M8006C223)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the number of successfully established additional E-RABs of QCI9. UPDATED: Transmission of an S1AP:E-RAB SETUP RESPONSE message sent by eNB to the MME. The counter is updated with the number of QCI9 bearers contained in the "E-RAB Setup List" IE.

kpi_info.title: SIMUL_ERAB_QCI1_MAX (M8006C224)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the maximum of sampled values for measuring the number of simultaneously established E-RABs with QCI1 characteristics. UPDATED: This measurement is obtained by sampling the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI1 characteristics at a pre-defined interval (1 sec). The counter is updated if the current number of simultaneous E-RABs is higher than the stored maximum.

UPDATED: This measurement is obtained by sampling the number of simultaneous E-RABs with QCI2 characteristics at a pre-defined interval (1 sec). The counter is updated if the current number of simultaneous E-RABs is higher than the stored maximum.

kpi_info.title: ERAB_NBR_DL_AVG (M8006C233)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the average number of non-GBR E-RABs with a configured nominal bit rate in DL. The reported value is 100 times higher than the actual value (for example 1.00 is stored as 100). UPDATED: The counter is updated by the arithmetic mean of the samples at the pre-defined interval (1 sec).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_NBR_UL_AVG (M8006C234)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the average number of non-GBR E-RABs with a configured nominal bit rate in UL. The reported value is 100 times higher than the actual value (for example 1.00 is stored as 100). UPDATED: The counter is updated by the arithmetic mean of the samples at the pre-defined interval (1 sec).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_NBR_DL_FAIL_OVL_AVG (M8006C235)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the average number of non-GBR E-RABs with a configured nominal bit rate in DL but which do not reach this nominal bit rate.The reported value is 100 times higher than the actual value (for example 1.00 is stored as 100). UPDATED: The counter is updated by the arithmetic mean of the samples at the pre-defined interval (1 sec).

kpi_info.title: ERAB_NBR_UL_FAIL_OVL_AVG (M8006C236)
kpi_info.use: This measurement provides the average number of non-GBR E-RABs with a configured nominal bit rate in UL but which do not reach this nominal bit rate.The reported value is 100 times higher than the actual value (for example 1.00 is stored as 100). UPDATED: The counter is updated by the arithmetic mean of the samples at the pre-defined interval (1 sec).

kpi_info.title: period_duration_sum (period_duration_sum)
kpi_info.use: Duration of the measurement period in minutes. Values summed up also in object dimension.
